title: Australia Accuses China of Shining Laser at Surveillance Plane
sub_head: Incident on Feb. 17 in Australia’s territorial waters was a deliberate act, defense minister says
body:
SYDNEY—Australia accused the Chinese navy of shining a military-grade laser at a surveillance plane flying over its territorial waters, in the latest escalation of tensions that have seen the two countries clash over trade, cybersecurity and election interference.
The P-8A Poseidon aircraft was monitoring two Chinese navy ships that were sailing east through the Arafura Sea north of Australia on Feb. 17 when it was targeted by a laser from one of the vessels, Australia’s Defense Department said.
